name: Create a Pipedrive CRM person and a deal from a Facebook Lead Ads form submission
description:
Every time a new Facebook Lead Ads form is submitted, Integromat will automatically create a Pipedrive CRM person and a deal.

Check out a more advanced version of this template: [Send Facebook leads to Pipedrive CRM and prevent lead duplication](https://www.make.com/en/templates/12015-send-facebook-leads-to-pipedrive-crm-and-prevent-lead-duplicates)
